issue.explanation: In order to use the ActivityResult APIs you must upgrade your Fragment version to 1.3.0. Previous versions of FragmentActivity failed to call super.onRequestPermissionsResult() and used invalid request codes
issue.message: Upgrade Fragment version to at least 1.3.0.
issue.summary: Upgrade Fragment version to at least 1.3.0.
